title: Book III
content: Containing the End of Mr. Esmond’s Adventures in England.

book.title: The History of Henry Esmond 亨利·埃斯蒙德
book.description: 简介： TO THE RIGHT HONORABLE WILLIAM BINGHAM, LORD ASHBURTON. MY DEAR LORD, The writer of a book which copies the manners and language of Queen Annes time, must not omit the Dedication to the Patron; and I ask leave to inscribe this volume to you...
